about_the_game:
Geometry Shooter PRO takes the exciting foundation of the original Geometry Shooter and cranks it up to the next level! Jump into this hand-drawn arcade game where precision meets action.

Fire from a moving cannon at expanding geometric shapes like circles, squares, and triangles, all while mastering the art of perfect shots and crazy combos.

In this enhanced version, experience brand-new PVP and CO-OP modes, where you can team up or compete with friends for the ultimate score.

No more game-overs after a single mistake! Now you have 3 lives to keep the fun going! Plus, discover bonus balls with unique effects that add new layers of strategy..

Whether you're a fan of the original or a new player, Geometry Shooter PRO promises even more challenging and exciting gameplay. Can you master the art of the perfect shot?

  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
